thread.title: Mamta Mohandas is a big House of Cards fan
thread.title_full: Mamta Mohandas is a big House of Cards fan - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Mamta Mohandas is a big House of Cards fan
text:
Mamta Mohandas has been lately spending a lot of time catching up with US sitcoms and her favourites include House of Cards, Breaking Bad and The American Horror Story.
About their respective lead characters, he actress tells us, "I am huge fan of Kevin Spacey, Aaron Paul and also Jessica Lange. I think more than ever before I am paying so much attention to good writing."
She says that she now has time to repeatedly watch the episodes in Netflix and also admire the quality of writing, which she hopes would find its way to Malayalam cinema too.
